column4: Okay, you guys, I'm new to this so please be easy with me.  I'm trying to connect to a wireless router for internet.  I have a wireless adapter plugged into my Ubuntu machine now.  It's an old version Ubuntu (I don't remember which one).  What's the first thing I should be doing?
I'm thinking I need to reinstall Ubuntu because it didn't install the drivers when I first installed it.
i was goign to suggest going to google, or https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WifiDocs/WiFiHowTo
Yeah, I'm browsing through the hundreds of documents about networking on the site.
